title: Lecture Note 2: Advanced Concepts in Number Systems

content.data: In this lecture, we delve deeper into number systems, including conversions between different bases and modular arithmetic.
Modular arithmetic is fundamental in many cryptographic algorithms.

challenges.question: $$7 \mod 3$$
challenges.solution: When 7 is divided by 3, the remainder is 1.

challenges.question: Convert the binary number 1010 to decimal.
challenges.solution: 1010 in binary is equal to 10 in decimal.
